name: Bench Dip
setup: Sit on bench edge, hands beside hips fingers forward
Extend legs with heels on floor (knees can stay slightly bent for easier version)
Scoot hips off edge, arms supporting body
steps: Inhale as you bend elbows, lowering body straight down—shoulders stay open
Exhale and press through palms to extend elbows back to start without locking hard
mistakes: Going too deep causing anterior shoulder strain
Using legs to jump body up
safety: If anterior shoulder discomfort, reduce range or switch to triceps bench push-up or cable press-down.

prescriptionHints.notes: Stop 1–2 reps before joint strain; maintain shoulder position.

joints.notes: Keep scapulae retracted lightly; wrists under shoulders.
